H0.text: Which car manufacturer produces the 'Sigma' model. Mitsubishi

H1.text: Which car manufacturer produces the 'Sigma' model. Holden

H2.text: Which car manufacturer produces the 'Sigma' model. Chrysler

H3.text: Which car manufacturer produces the 'Sigma' model. VAUXHALL

A4.text: Mitsubishi has utilized the 'Sigma' name on several different vehicles based on Mitsubishi Galant and Mitsubishi Diamante sold in various markets during this time.

A5.text: Between 1977 and 1980, prior to Mitsubishi taking over Chrysler Australia's operations, this model had been marketed as the Chrysler Sigma.

A6.text: The Sigma sedan was sold in Japan and Europe between 1991 and 1996.

A7.text: In Europe, the Australian-built station wagon derivative was also sold under the Sigma name.
